summary: Completed testing of Saqr App new homepage with analytics, rewards settings in admin dashboard, and bottom navigation. All requested features are working correctly.
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_rewards_api.py - Created new test file for rewards API
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features are working. Homepage has balance card, start watching button, statistics, and daily challenge. Admin dashboard has rewards tab with editable settings. Bottom navigation has exactly 4 items.

homepage_balance_card.details: Balance card shows رصيدك الحالي with $0.00 for guest users

homepage_start_watching_button.details: Button with data-testid='start-watching-btn' opens full-screen ads viewer

homepage_statistics.details: Statistics section (إحصائياتك) shows today's ads, remaining, total points, and earning rate

homepage_daily_challenge.details: Daily challenge section (التحدي اليومي) shows progress bar and reward

bottom_navigation.details: Contains exactly 4 items: الرئيسية (Home), أعلن الآن (Advertiser), حسابي (Profile), إعلانات (Ads)

admin_rewards_tab.details: Admin dashboard has المكافآت tab with editable settings for points_per_ad, daily_limit, daily_challenges, tips

api_public_rewards.details: GET /api/settings/public/rewards returns correct structure with points_per_ad, daily_limit, daily_challenges, tips

api_admin_rewards.details: GET/PUT /api/settings/rewards works with admin token for reading and updating rewards settings
